amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for salaries and expenses of the Office of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity by $304,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment reduce the salaries and expenses account for the Office of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity by $304,000, and apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 247 (Roll no. 428).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 247 (Roll no. 428).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
